content: भवितव्य {%<ab>pot. p.</ab>%} About to take place, about to happen, likely to be, often used like भाव्य impersonally, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} in the neuter gender and singular number, with the instrumental of the subject and the predicative word; त्वया मम सहायेन भवितव्यं <ls>Ś. 2</ls>; गुरुणा कारणेन भवितव्यं <ls>Ś. 6.</ls> --व्यं What is destined to happen; भवितव्यं भवत्येव यद्विवर्मनसि स्थितं Subhāsh
